titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to include in a special use permit with regard to Humboldt Nursery a provision allowing the permittee to use Government-owned farming and related equipment at the Nursery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.

bill.summary: 7/9/1997--Introduced. Amends Federal law (Granger-Thye Act) with respect to the Humboldt Nursery, Six Rivers National Forest, California, to authorize a special use permit to include a provision allowing permittee use of Government-owned farming and related equipment at the Nursery.
